short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lookup and display blockchain transaction details

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sage is the ultimate tool for understanding complex blockchain transactions. With a simple click, you can instantly analyze any transaction hash and get a human-readable summary in the browser side panel.

Key Features:
-Effortless Analysis: Select any transaction hash on any webpage and instantly view a clear, human-readable summary of the transaction's details.
-Deep Dive Insights: Explore complex transactions with ease. Understand liquidity pool interactions, staking, and more.
-Multi-Blockchain Support: No more switching between different block explorers, analyse transactions across 50+ blockchains, including all major EVM chains and Solana.

Whether you're a web3 accountant or crypto enthusiast, Sage simplifies your workflow by making sense of complex  blockchain  data for you.
